description:
All new filters and borders added!

Now with more social: Built in flickr & twitpic uploading.

Apply the coolest vintage style filters to your photos! 

MOLO Photo Filters Pro lets you apply awesome filters and effects to your photographs and makes it easy for you to share them with a friend or set them as your wallpaper. With the slick ReFilter button, you can keep reapplying filters to the same photo! 

Included Filters:  MOLO, Rockstar, Mars, Dazed, Julee, Blues, Scuffed, X-Pro, Grainy, Leaky, Mono, Ginger, Washed, Bleach Bypass, Normalize, Three, & Redscale.

Included Borders: Instant, 35, Photo, Grunge, & Decay

If you're updating, make sure to tap on "Check for new filters" in the app menu to get the new filters.

Images are saved in the Photos app in the MOLO folder.

Disclaimer: Please note that MOLO Photo Filters Pro utilizes a web service to process your photos and will work best over a wifi connection. Photos are deleted from the server every 30 minutes. 

ideation by Chinchilla Tech
